I purchased this for the warmer climate. It’s cold right now even in Florida! I loved the colors in this particular V-neck shirt.  I purchased a large and it fits nicely. I have not washed it yet or worn it, but I will make sure I will not put this in the dryer for several reasons. If you want anything looser, you might want to size up, but it is true to size with no room to give  The material of this is kind of I would say funky. It’s a thinner material that’s a little shiny. I’m hoping that it is a shirt that will hold up as long as I wash it carefully and hang it to dry. The other glitch is as you see from the picture, there is no drying instructions. That makes me very cautious, which I usually am for my shirts and I hang them all to drive but once in a while one does get stuck in the dryer. I don’t like when there is no drying instructions not just for me, but for anybody that buys this shirt.  Once I wear this a few times, if it holds up, I would probably purchase another one since it was such a variety of color overall, it was a good purchase.

评论概述: I like the color, the material is a bit clingy
评论详情: I really do like the shirt, it is comfortable, and it is slightly oversized, which I appreciate. The fabric tends to get statically really easily, even though it is cotton, and that makes it just a little bit irritating to wear. It could be because of the style of undershirt that I wear with it, but other cotton shirts, I have don’t seem to have the same issue. The color is beautiful, And I still wear it weekly even with the static. It’s quite flattering, you can put it on with leggings and wear it loose or you can have it with other pants and do a French talk and it looks great either way. It’s a great value for the money, the quality is , good enough that I have washed it multiple times and it’s still staying vibrant.
